data.name: RPG Maker MZ - SFBeats Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
This is a collection of music that are best suited for science fiction and dark fantasy themed stories!
The pack features a collection of music suitable as title music, field music, or battle music, make good use of them the way you see fit and add another layer of depth to your game!

*******************************************
▽Contents
Audio：12（ogg、m4a）
*******************************************
